long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A productivity-first approach to your browser experience.
Spectral is a lightweight & streamlined user interface for managing bookmarks, tasks, emails, etc..

Features:

Modular:  Pick and choose which modules you would like to use.
Customizable:  Comes with powerful customization tools to make you feel at home.
Keyboard friendly: Optimized for efficiency with useful keyboard shortcuts.
Works offline: Access and manage your data with or without internet access.
Background Sync:  Sync your bookmarks & data across all devices in real-time.
Lightweight:  Spectral is designed to use low resources. No spinners or waiting.
